content:
What a great idea! A museum party can be a unique and educational celebration for your niece's birthday!

To provide you with information on children's museums in your area and their party packages, I'll need to know your location. Could you please share your city or zip code with me?

Once I have that information, I can give you a list of children's museums in your area, along with their party package details, including:

1. Museum name and location
2. Party package options (e.g., themed parties, private rooms, activities, and amenities)
3. Party duration and scheduling options
4. Pricing and package inclusions (e.g., food, drinks, decorations, and activities)
5. Any additional services or options (e.g., catering, party favors, or add-ons)

Please provide your location, and I'll do my best to give you a comprehensive list of children's museums in your area and their party packages!
